name: GetOutgoingCommunications
description:
Retrieve outgoing SMS and email communications.

Use this tool to access a list of outgoing SMS and email communications. Requires an Enterprise subscription.

parameters.name: organization_uri
parameters.description: URI to identify the organization for which to return outgoing communications.

value_schema.description: Return outgoing communications from the organization associated with this URI

parameters.name: number_of_records
parameters.description: Specify the number of outgoing communication records to return.

value_schema.description: The number of records to return

parameters.name: filter_communications_after
parameters.description: Include outgoing communications created after this UTC time. Format: "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.sssZ".

value_schema.description: Include outgoing communications that were created after this time (sample time format: "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z"). This time should use the UTC timezone

parameters.name: end_date_time_utc
parameters.description: Include outgoing communications created before this UTC time. Format: "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z".

value_schema.description: Include outgoing communications that were created prior to this time (sample time format: "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z"). This time should use the UTC timezone

parameters.name: pagination_token
parameters.description: Token used to retrieve the next set of outgoing communication records.

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next portion of the collection

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the calendly API.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Return outgoing communications from the organization associated with this URI

value_schema.description: Return outgoing communications from the organization associated with this URI

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of records to return

value_schema.description: The number of records to return

parameters.name: min_created_at
parameters.description: Include outgoing communications that were created after this time (sample time format: "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z"). This time should use the UTC timezone

value_schema.description: Include outgoing communications that were created after this time (sample time format: "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z"). This time should use the UTC timezone

parameters.name: max_created_at
parameters.description: Include outgoing communications that were created prior to this time (sample time format: "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z"). This time should use the UTC timezone

value_schema.description: Include outgoing communications that were created prior to this time (sample time format: "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z"). This time should use the UTC timezone

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: The token to pass to get the next portion of the collection

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next portion of the collection

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
